CustomField.description: Renders the current connection status of the supplier's Viator connection. The data should be in sync with the status label on the Viator Dashboard on Bokun found here: https://extranet.bokun.io/admin/viator-vendor.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Renders the current connection status of the supplier's Viator connection. The data should be in sync with the status label on the Viator Dashboard on Bokun found here: https://extranet.bokun.io/admin/viator-vendor.
CustomField.label: Viator Connection Status
